attributes.additional_details: I’d like the government to allow pet bereavement leave in the work place, for some people losing a pet is as emotional as loosing a family member. It’s not an easy thing to get over and to be expected to go to work straight after an animal dying can be very difficult. We care, feed, protect and love our pets like a child, when the time comes we need time to grieve, they are not just pets they are members of the family and we need to start treating it this way to help people deal with the loss.
attributes.background: Losing a pet can be like loosing a family member and should be treated the same in terms of bereavement leave, I’d like the government allow family pet bereavement leave in the work place. We care, feed and love our pets like a family member and it should be treated this way in terms of bereavement.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This would be a decision for individual employers.
